wikipedia_page.main: Cameron Sinclair is a Scottish composer, conductor and percussionist based in London.

response: *Cameron Sinclair – The Secret of the Universe

Cameron Sinclair (born 16 November 1973) is a designer, writer and one of the pioneers in socially responsive architecture. He is CEO of the Worldchanging Institute and currently serving as pro bono executive director of Armory of Harmony, a US-based organization focused on repurposing decommissioned weapons into musical instruments.

In 2004, Fortune Magazine named Cameron Sinclair as one of the Aspen Seven, seven people changing the world for the better. He was the recipient of the 2006 TED Prize and the 2005 RISD Emerging Designer of the Year. Along with co-founder Kate Stohr, was awarded the Wired Magazine 2006 Rave Award for Architecture for their work in responding to housing needs following Hurricane Katrina.
** Cameron Sinclair's 24 min TED Prize Talk at TED Conference (2006) Monterey, CA
